NumberStarStar  stop,

) [inline]

in-core normalization with sketches. ///

Parameters:
start start of vector of vectors ///
stop end of vector of vectors ///
istop end of first vector ///
sketchSizeMax the size of sketches to use ///
Returns:
the data normalized in place ///
Remarks:
/// This provides the same interface as the other norm functions. /// Note that this function is for reference as it does not save any memory. /// (But it can save time.) To save memory, you need to discard the celfile /// input as they are converted into sketches. Then read them back in /// apply the sketch and write it out.
